body: I found this server about 9 months ago, and well, i got hooked :D. I've been playing quite religiously, spending most of my time on Minecraft on this very server. I enjoy the community here and absolutely love being called a hacker. I usually play on Nebula, due to the fact that I LOVE PVP, although i dont mind a good game of Walls every now and then! Within a few days i was able to get ranked 2210th alltime on the server, i am also working hard to get my first Prestige!(On Nebula) I hope you guys enjoy me as much as i enjoy the server, and don't mind checking out my Twitter!

title: Hey, I'm SergeantBoom!!!!

replies.body: Hey there ! ! :D Welcome to the Avicus Community ! :)) If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact a Staff Member, as we will help you! ^-^ As for that, enjoy your stay on Avicus ! :DD
